Meenta β Program

Are you interested in learning what on-demand sequencing looks like? We are looking for opinionated early adaptors who willing to provide feedback and user testing for our current web application.

Join Our Beta Program

FYI, We know your time is valuable, so offer a $25 Itunes or Amazon gift card for users who qualify and complete our testing process.
